Sentencas: Ceria based solid solution doped by Cu, Mn, Sm(Nd) were synthesized by the co-precipitation method, followed by calcination at the temperature of 500 degrees C. It was shown that all obtained powders of solid solutions crystallized into a cubic structure of the fluorite type, with an average particle size of 4-10 nm.
Titulo: Sm(Nd) doped ceria materials for multifunctional application

Sentencas: However, such complex solid solutions were only stable up to 1050 degrees C.
Titulo: Sm(Nd) doped ceria materials for multifunctional application

Sentencas: The characterization results revealed that solid solutions had significantly enhanced surface area, increased oxygen mobility and higher quantity of oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Sm(Nd) doped ceria materials for multifunctional application

Sentencas: The catalytic activity of the samples in the oxidation of CO was determined by the flow method at atmospheric pressure.
Titulo: Sm(Nd) doped ceria materials for multifunctional application

Sentencas: The system containing neodymium was more active than the one containing samarium: Cu0.08Mn0.02Sm0.05Ce0.85O2-delta (T100% = 180 degrees C) and Cu0.08Mn0.02Nd0.05Ce0.85O2-delta (T100% = 130 degrees C).
Titulo: Sm(Nd) doped ceria materials for multifunctional application

Sentencas: These materials were tested as a potential low-cost solid electrolyte for application in solid oxide fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature (ITSOFC).
Titulo: Sm(Nd) doped ceria materials for multifunctional application

Sentencas: The highest conductivity for intermediate temperature application (sigma 600 degrees C = 4.10- 3 S/cm) was found in system Cu0.08Mn0.02Sm0.05Zr0.1Ce0.75O2-delta: the system with zirconium makes it possible to stabilize the ceria lattice during high-temperature sintering, thereby increasing the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Sm(Nd) doped ceria materials for multifunctional application

Sentencas: The detailed study of the composition effect on both the structural properties and the textural and surface properties in Cu0.08Mn0.02Sm(Nd)xCe0.9-xO2-delta oxides was carried out in this work.
Titulo: Sm(Nd) doped ceria materials for multifunctional application
